CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1957, pg. 2, reads: "Stopped Sink - This sink was stopped up with filthy water at one of the Western Ave. dwellings. Tenants said the landlord should keep it open.  Landlord said at a zoning hearing that tenants and their children 'clog up his plumbing and cost him hundreds of dollars in costly repairs."
TitMainTitle: Bathroom with clogged sink with dirty water, and toilet with patterned seat and Alacta can on tank, in apartment building on Western Avenue
